posts.content:
Fuel tank - reproduction never used been stored a few years but pretty much as new £90



Easicool cooler £60



Argyll Cooker **SOLD**



I am happy to send the cooler and the cooker at buyers cost via Hermes but tank needs collecting from Ascot (too long for Hermes). Could bring to Stonor Park.

As the SSVC resident cooker collector it is with great sadness that I have to say that I'll buy the Argyll. Not going to Stonor but if you know anyone going on the Road Trip for No Reason next weekend I could pick it up from them.

BJ1 wrote:As the SSVC resident cooker collector it is with great sadness that I have to say that I'll buy the Argyll. Not going to Stonor but if you know anyone going on the Road Trip for No Reason next weekend I could pick it up from them.
Nice one Brian. Don't know anyone on the trip but anyone who is or going to Stonor let me know and I'll pass it to them.
Hi is fuel tank still available?

Hi - per my PM with collino just now please assume this is the cheaper repro available at Heritage for £158 which according to their description

Description:

Fuel tank with a fixed fuel filler neck. Please note the tank has a hole for fuel sender, if the vehicle has no fuel gauge you will need to use a blanking plate.

Quality:

Reproduction

Fitting:

The fuel filler neck isn't welded to the tank in the correct place, it will require bending or cutting and re-welding to fit. The tank uses a 60mm fuel cap

Hopefully I am OK to copy this from their site - if not I am sure I will soon find out.

Cheers

Mark
